Installation
============

Requirements
------------

- Python 3.12+
- 8 GB RAM minimum

Install
-------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install xpcs-toolkit

Development Install
-------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/imewei/XPCS-Toolkit.git
   cd XPCS-Toolkit
   pip install -e .

Verify
------

.. code-block:: python

   import xpcs_toolkit
   print(xpcs_toolkit.__version__)
